topic: Mother 3 is finally coming to the West as Earthbound 2. Release date TBD
Project HAMMER is being ressurected for the switch. Only a trailer is shown
A sizzle reel with indie games is shown. Including a new Shovel Kinght game.
Reggie Fill-Aime will appear, confirming he will return to Nintendo in some form.
Shigeru Miyamoto is confirmed to be working on a New IP.
Furukawa appears, announcing plans to buy studios to diversify Nintendo's games portfolio.
Microsoft's Xcloud is announced to be coming to Switch.
There will be a new fighter pass for Smash Ultimate.
